subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant had 30 points, including 5 of 6 free throws in the final 75 seconds of the second overtime Wednesday night to propel No. 15 Texas past the seventh-ranked Aggies.
snippet: Kevin Durant had 30 points, including 5 of 6 free throws in the final 75 seconds of the second overtime Wednesday night to propel No. 15 Texas past the seventh-ranked Aggies.
